findings.title: QSP-1 Overflow on The Libsecp256k1
findings.description: Libsecp256k1 accepts signatures whose R or S parameter is larger than the secp256k1 curve order, which differs from other implementations. This could lead to invalid signatures being verified.

findings.title: Lack of Validation in the `what` Parameter
findings.description: In the `signable_message` function, there is no limit on the length of the variable `what`, which can cause a denial of service during the execution of this function call.
